name: BFF BFG
description:
BFF BFG

BFF BFG is a game created in under 48 hours. Shoot enemies, avoid walls, attach friendly ships to yourself. Survive as many waves as possible.

Controls:

The game supports keyboard

Ship Controls

Control your ship with WASD
Press Space to Shoot
Press Z to scale window size
Press Backspace to restart game

Details:

Touching different friendly ships will connect them to your body allowing for more powerful attacks! Shoot down enemy aliens as they snake down towards you. Destroy the glowing ones to spawn friendly ships. Blast through metal walls to get through safely. As you get bigger you get stronger. But you also become a bigger target! How many waves can you survive!

Credits:

Game by Alejandro Robles (Rohbert)
Graphics by Sushi Dragon
